name: NSUnderlineStyle
desc: Constants for the underline style and strikethrough style attribute keys.

items.name: static var patternDashDot: NSUnderlineStyle
items.desc: Draw a line of alternating dashes and dots.

items.name: static var patternDashDotDot: NSUnderlineStyle
items.desc: Draw a line of alternating dashes and two dots.

items.name: static var byWord: NSUnderlineStyle
items.desc: Draw the line only beneath or through words, not whitespace.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates an underline style with the specified raw value.
